Mr. Worldwide welcomes you to this magical site of fun and learning! The translation tool here is provided by the Yandex Translation engine.

Important: Yandex allows one million characters to be translated per day. This seems like quite a lot, but remember that Mr. Worldwide translates your phrase every time you edit a letter (add or remove a character). Therefore, if you type in a 6-letter word, Mr. Worldwide translates it not 1 time, but 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 5 + 6 = 21 times! So if you type 1413 letters one after another you will reach the daily limit.
